key_risks: Supply chain disruptions due to global events like COVID-19 and geopolitical tensions
Challenges in navigating complex and changing international trade regulations
Intense competition from global logistics providers and digital freight platforms
controversies: Ongoing scrutiny over environmental practices despite sustainability initiatives
Moderate employee satisfaction with noted dissatisfaction in vacation policies and work environments
environmental_issues: Need to further reduce carbon emissions to meet regulatory and stakeholder expectations
social_issues: Employee dissatisfaction with vacation policies and department-specific work environments
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks and potential legal issues from non-compliance

sources.title: Environment - Expeditors
